reviewText: With Iridology we have a way to look into the inter workings of the body without invasive methods and treat problems sometimes before they even surface. Through the eyes we can see past problems as with a broken arm or some other past problem area. This video is not for those of us who know how Iridology works but for those of us which need to understand how we can benefit from this method of diagnosing and treating without using harmful chemical drugs.

You will be very disappointed with this tape if you expect to learn much about the diagnostic techniques of iridology. The video discusses the topic  at such a broad level that it is useless to anyone who has even the  smallest previous exposure to the topic.
